page.title: 13Fordham Printers
page.content: {Fordham Printers}is a{limited company owned by{three}share holders. Mr. & Mrs. Mann and their son Stuart who runs the company. They employ {28}people mostly from{Fordham}and {Burwell.}The company started in{1953 and Stuart started in{1973.}He explained what{changes}had occured so that{printing}was{quicker}and more efficient. They print{books, tickets, {pamphlets}and{brochures}and they print about{17-20}jobs a day. They work from {8.00am}to{5.00pm . 80%}of printing is within{40}miles of{Newmarket}and{10% for{export.}Stuart said that without {modern machinery}they would need a{100 staff. We also saw some{machines in working order.Stuarts work involves {sorting}out his{post}and{solving}other peoples problems and seeing customers. Fordham Printers was{one}of the{first companies to be{computerised.
